scripts.start: concurrently "cd walcron-microfrontend-visualizer; npm run dev" "cd walcron-microfrontend-monitor; npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd walcron-microfrontend-visualizer; npm run build" "cd walcron-microfrontend-monitor; npm run build"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd walcron-microfrontend-visualizer; npm run start" "cd walcron-microfrontend-monitor; npm run start"
